text: José Manuel Lara Bosch (8 March 1946 - 31 January 2015) was a Spanish media executive and businessman. He was the CEO of Grupo Planeta since 2003 and Atresmedia since 2012. Bosch was born in Barcelona, Spain. Bosch died in Barcelona, Spain from pancreatic cancer, aged 68.Fallece José Manuel Lara Bosch, el editor que llevó Planeta al futuro. El País. Date: 31 January 2015. He is survived by his wife of 40 years, Consuelo García Píriz and his four children. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Spanish businesspeople Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Disease-related deaths in Barcelona Category:People from Barcelona
title: José Manuel Lara Bosch
